## Describe the Bug
A clear and concise description of what the bug is.

## Tool Affected
Which tool has the issue? (e.g., `organize`, `password`, `hash`)

## To Reproduce
Steps to reproduce the behavior:
1. Run command `python -m devtoolkit ...`
2. With arguments `...`
3. See error

## Expected Behavior
What you expected to happen.

## Actual Behavior
What actually happened. Include the full error message if applicable.
